author: potuz
content:
https://collective.flashbots.net/t/block-scoring-for-mev-boost-relays/202/33?u=potuz
I was brought to this issue. What do clients think about including withdrawals in our local block comparison? if builders are including the value of withdrawals to inflate the bids, the minimum we could do to not break the local comparison would be to either ship with a high default (I was advocating at least 20% but was voted down in Prysm) or include this on the local value
